title: It is not possible to transfer IP/BE nor RP from one account to another. Can it be?
body:
Hey fam!

Skidmarkmania here, posting from my in-game suspended account. I have two queries for you guys and gals today.

_First_, I'm aware RP can be gifted, and I'm positive I have some still on my suspended account; can I get it gifted **to** my Alt?

_Second_, there was a large laaaarge amount of IP on this suspended account, is it at all possible with the new system to gift that to my Alt so that I could take advantage of that IP/BE just sitting there? If not, wouldn't that be super cool?!


That's all I have. Thanks! The following link is an update on other stuff unrelated to this thread, but pertaining to my summoner.

[What's up Fam!?](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/Rkj0Kc0a-whats-up-fam)


See you on the Rift!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

-Skidmarkmania

replies.body:
Hey, congrats on getting stuff together, that's a huge accomplishment :)

For your first question, gifted RP can only be purchased directly, not given from your own existing RP pool. (not in-client at least, maybe through a ticket?)

For your second question, IP (now BE) has never been transferable, so I think you'll have to take the hit on this one :(

Stay positive!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Xaeros,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7h1fXAEu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-10T03:55:16.286+0000)
>
> Hey, congrats on getting stuff together, that's a huge accomplishment :)
> 
> For your first question, gifted RP can only be purchased directly, not given from your own existing RP pool. (not in-client at least, maybe through a ticket?)
> 
> For your second question, IP (now BE) has never been transferable, so I think you'll have to take the hit on this one :(
> 
> Stay positive!
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thanks for the clarification! That's alright, I figured there was no harm in asking. T3T

GLHF!

This pretty much sums it up, just wanted to step in to confirm. The only way to gift RP is to buy the RP *as a gift*. You can't send RP you already have as a gift, and we can't transfer content between accounts at all.
